_header: He that is dead and hence go

OxfMagd93.Transcription:
He þat ys ded & hens goȜyt schal he lyue for euer
                    mo
OxfMagd93.Note: Written as verse in upper margin.
OxfMagd93.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus codicum mss. qui in collegiis aulisque
                oxoniensibus….
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1852: 50.
